data.title: Which of User Exit or BADi could be used to populate equipment number in operation equipment field

qas.question: Hi Experts, I want to populate equipment number in the operation equipment field as snapshot shows. I have custom logics to populate sub equipment number, but I need to find a user exit or BADi to realize it. I want to populate equipment number in the operation equipment field as snapshot shows. I have custom logics to populate sub equipment number, but I need to find a user exit or BADi to realize it. I found 2 BADi (ALM_ME_001_ORDER Order/Operation Data, WORKORDER_UPDATE Business Add-In PM/PP/PS/PI Orders Operation: UPDATE ) from internet, however I am not sure whether these BADi are applicable for this requirement as I have less experience in ABAP development. I found 2 BADi (ALM_ME_001_ORDER Order/Operation Data, WORKORDER_UPDATE Business Add-In PM/PP/PS/PI Orders Operation: UPDATE ) from internet, however I am not sure whether these BADi are applicable for this requirement as I have less experience in ABAP development. Could you kindly help me have a look at these BADi. If they are not applicable, is there other user exit or BADi which fulfill customer’s requirement? Could you kindly help me have a look at these BADi. If they are not applicable, is there other user exit or BADi which fulfill customer’s requirement? BTW, if I want to get technical document of BADi, where can I get it? BTW, if I want to get technical document of BADi, where can I get it? Thank you very much! Thank you very much! Wesley Wesley

answers.text: HelloWesely, Wesely Wesely I think you are in EHP5 or above, where Business functionLOG_EAM_OLCwas activated. Perhaps this makes the Equipment field of the Operation tab enabled. The earlier versions do not have this. However, coming to your query: LOG_EAM_OLC 1. About the BAdi 1. About the BAdi To my judgementWORKORDER_UPDATEwould the job of updating this field. Using methodBEFORE_UPDATE. WORKORDER_UPDATE BEFORE_UPDATE. Also the other BAdi namelyALM_ME_001_ORDERdoes not seem is for this purpose, also should not be preferred, because this is not for multiple use. (BAdiWORKORDER_UPDATEis for multiple use). ALM_ME_001_ORDERdoes not seem is for this purpose, also should not be preferred, because this is not for multiple use. (BAdiWORKORDER_UPDATEis for multiple use). ALM_ME_001_ORDER WORKORDER_UPDATE Also you can use fmCO_BT_AFVG_UPDATEin user-exitIWO10009to update this Equipment field at SAVE event of the Order. CO_BT_AFVG_UPDATE IWO10009 2. Document on BAdi 2. Document on BAdi Step by Step guide for BADI Multiple use implementation Step by Step guide for BADI Multiple use implementation Searching and implementing BADI - An example Searching and implementing BADI - An example Detailed explanation about BADI and the ways to find the BADI with an example (ME23n transaction) Detailed explanation about BADI and the ways to find the BADI with an example (ME23n transaction) Creating our own BAdI Creating our own BAdI Regards KJogeswaraRao KJogeswaraRao

data.title: Via Which Transaction, I can post the values for ASSETS??

qas.question: Hi Experts, Via AS01, I created a my_asset_1 with quantity of 100, fine. But, pls., let me know that, 1- How/Where shuld I post the values for the my_asset_1? 2- While creation via AS01, system did not asked me the Inventory#/Material#, so, Where shuld I post/assign the same? ThaNQ.

answers.text: Hi While creation of asset you should not fill in the quantity filed with value the value for quantity filed gets updated when you procure an asset via F-90 or MIGO. When you procure an asset via F-90 you have the quantity filled that has to be filled in, which in turn will update the asset master record automatically after posting the transaction. Good luck Hari

data.title: Need to return goods which is initially uploaded..

qas.question: Dear All, In my system stock of material (suppose material is "x") is there say qty -600 which is initially uploaded(561 movement) And now i want to return 200 out of it to my vendor...How i can return this to him if i want to return invoice (J1IS) against it. Please let me know the process or any other alternative to solve the same. Thanks, Naren

answers.text: Do 1. Return p.o against vendor 2. Goods receipt -MIGO(movement type - 161) 3. Do J1IS - ref doc type - MATD 4. Raise credit memo.

answers.text: Hi Carlin Hush Try this SELECT T0.[CardCode],T0.[CardName], T1.[Name], T0.[CntctPrsn] FROM OCRD T0 INNER JOIN OCPR T1 ON T0.CardCode = T1.CardCode Regards Jenny

Please check below it may help you. Have you tried where used list for a part number, you can feed in an material and run this report to see in how many BOM's its being used as component. CS15- Single-Levelwhere-usedList CS15 where where where used used used Production®Master data®Bills of material®Reporting®Usage®Material. Production® ® Master data® ® Bills of material® ® Reporting® ® Usage® ® Material. Another report is available in standard SAP to do BOM comparison to find differences in BOM. Executing a BOM Comparison - BOMs (PP-BD-BOM) - SAP Library Executing a BOM Comparison - BOMs (PP-BD-BOM) - SAP Library Check this two transactions and it will give you idea on how to proceed on your custom report. Thanks Ritesh

data.title: Which movement type to show Directly Procured material in stock?

qas.question: Hi All Is there another movement type that I can use to reverse from a network, Directly Procured material in to stock? Our issue is that we plan and have delivered directly procured material to out production plant (Plant A) and the PO has an account assignment of 'N'. The production team then decide (due to unforseen issues) that they do not need it anymore for that network/WBS and want to send it to our central warehouse (Plant B) In order to recover the cost from the network, we process MB1A mvt 222 with reference to the WBS in Plant A and then stock transfer to our central warehouse, Plant B My question is....can we use another movement type to remove the cost from the project/network/WBS and return the material in to stock? I don't want to reverse the PO but can i use that as a reference? Your help is appreciated Regards Darren

answers.text: MB1A transaction is a goods issue goods issues are valuated with the material master valuation price. in goods issues you cannot reference purchase orders (this is only possible in receipts) there is no goods receipt transaction for material which was already received against a PO. You credit the network with the leading price from material master, there is no value flow in the opposite direction. But you can control the valuation if you allow external value entry in the movement, which is usually not liked by auditors, especially as such movements are executed by warehouse personnel

data.title: Pay a purchase invoice which has been partially reconciled

qas.question: Hello experts Accounting users are asking if it is possible to take a purchase invoice which has been partially reconciled and pay the rest of it with a different payment method (not reconciliation). It doesn't seem to be possible, as affected invoice's payment method is informed as "Reconciliation" and it is not possible to change it back anymore. Due to this Payment Wizard is not being able to catch the invoice. Is there some solution or workaround? Thanks in advance and regards

answers.text: Hi, It is not possible to change invoice payment method after you have partial payment. This is by design. The work around is to pay on account and reconcile it with invoice. Thanks, Gordon

data.title: Please help me: Which transaction to print a invoice?

qas.question: Hi all, I have a invoice, i would like toprint this invoice as below: print this invoice as below: 1. Tcode VF02 + invoice number. 2. In invoice screen, menu: GOTO --> HEADER --> OUTPUT (Shift + F8). 3.In output print screen, add a new record intothe output grid list. In output print screen the output grid list. 4. Menu: Output --> Exit (Shift + F3) to back to invoice screen. 5. In invoice screen, menu: Billing document> issue output to *> Printer*. But the problem is here: Menu"Printer"is in grey color, I can no longer choose"Printer". So I can't print the invoice! "Printer" "Printer" Could you please help me: how can i print the invoice?Is therean other transaction to executethe records of output grid list in output print (step number 3 above)? Could you please help me: how can i print the invoice? an other transaction to execute Thanks all you a lot in advance, Vinh Vo

answers.text: Hi, To print the invoice goto VF02, enter the invoice number. Do not click enter. Click on billing document above. Choose "Issue output to". There choose the output you want a print of and in 'Print options'. Enter the printer details and then click on the "print" option. Regards, Shanu.

data.title: XL Reporter - Which dimension for BOM reporting??

qas.question: Hi All, I was wondering in which file I can find (or put together) BOM master data. I tried few tests with Product View, but measures related to it seem to belong to transactional more than master data. Thanks a lot !! Charles

answers.text: You can use Dimension - ProductTree & Items, Measure - Quantity to get BOM master data. You can add IssueMethod or something more if you need. Thanks, Gordon

data.title: To Reduce Asset Value Which has Run Depreciation

qas.question: Hi, I have a request to reduce asset value, but the asset has run depreciation for three month in the system, I want to know how to reduce the asset value and recalculate previous depreciation posted value of the asset? Please share the detailed procedure within the thread, if can provide the manual for this case step by step, it's better! Thanks in advance. All suggestion will be awarded. Tao

answers.text: Hi Tao, Do you want to reduce the Asset value from $10,000 to $ 5,000? If so, please post a Credit entry to the asset account. pstg CR 75 Asset account **** DR 40 Concerned account **** If you are in the same year, then the system would recalculate the Depr and post the difference in the next Depr run. But if you are in the different FY, then post a write up depr for the Asset value reduced (Depr on $5,000 in previous FY). Use t-code ABZU to post the write up. Please revert in case you have any questions.

data.title: Information is lost after redeployment of SAPMEINT - which workaround?

qas.question: Hello! After redeployment of SAPMEINT I noticed that some information concerning the SAMEINT MII webservices gets lost. I corrected this information manually afterwards - the information can be found in the old SAP ME 5.2 documentation (pre SP05). What I did was first undeploy of SAPMEINT and immediately afterwards a new deploy. Was the undeploy step unnecessary and therefore this step caused this annoyance? Or is it always necessary to re-run the SAPMEINT configuration wizard? I know that it is this configuration wizard, which updates the information as part of its function. This is the manual workaround: 1. Log on the SAP NW admkinistratior console 2. Goto Configuration Management / Infrastructure / Java System Properties / choose Applications tab 3. Search for application xappsmeintegration~ear 4. Change the following properties: webservice.authenticationMechanismType = 1 webservice.Username = MESYS webService.Password = <password of MESYS> webservice.EndPointUrlPrefix = <URL to (MII hostname:port)/XMII/SOAPRunner> Kr, Erich Lind

answers.text: Hello Erich, Could you please explain why did you undeploy/deploy SAPMEINT? Usually standard update procedure in JSPM is needed. As you know ME 5.2 SP5 CTC Wizard is provided, which must be updated together with SAPMEINT, to configure the integration. And yes, re-running of CTC Wizard is necessary after update. Regards, Alex.

data.title: Processing Cancellation Invoice for which Delivery Document got archived

qas.question: Hi, We have a scenario where the Delivery Document with reference to which the Cancellation Invoice was created has now been archived. The Sales Document is at status 'Completed'. But we are not able to post the Invoice document as it checks the status of the preceeding document which got archived. We are not able to post this Cancellation Invoice nor are we able to Cancel the same as the system keeps checking the preceeding document status. Is there any way to get rid of this document in the system or process it further? Can we process this document through transaction FB70 where we provide the reference to this Cancellation Invoice and post it? Please guide in this regard. Regards, Piyush Sagolekar

answers.text: How you can create a Cancellation Invoice wrt the Delivery Number. As per the standard process , cancel the Invoice wrt to Invoice which has already been created.In case if your Delivery is archived , you can still post the Cancel Invoice if both are in the same Billing Date. If the Invoice or PGI was done on previous month & the period is closed then it that case , it will not allow to post the Cancel Invoice. Best Regards, Ankur

data.title: which could be better implementing ess or company's portal

qas.question: Hello Experts One of my client wants to know that which would be better option for them considering reducing hr workload and cost factor ESS or Companys portal.They are having ESS but they are only using it for leave and personal information.They want to add many more like Fun forum Discussion forum IT tax module Help desk Ask an expert opinion polls employee satisfaction survey Newsletter and many more I want to know what i should suggest them.What i believe is ESS will be quite expensive to them bcoz license will be required.Plz Let me know if license is required in ESS then for what license will be required.They also wanted salary slip.Or portal will be best option.Plz let me know the comparison between both. ShubhaC

answers.text: HI, I think they need ESS licences to implement ESS. But when they put in additional services they don't need to Pay extra, But they have to customize or develop all these services which might take both time and cost. Via Portal also they can do this that is also good option. One thing i have to say is they can also use portal and ess both at the same time. Mean let them create portal and provide all these funcionalities there and use ESS as link and give them what ever SAP Standard ESS provides i.e salary slips showing,leave application and approval via workflow, display or change personnel data, family data,etc. Hope you got your answer atleast some idea if not full. Regards. Afrasyab

data.title: Which is the best SAP course suited and where in Delhi NCR

qas.question: Hello All, I am basically from the pharma/healthcare/life science domain and I have got 4 years of experience in the same domain as QC/QA Microbiologists. Now I am looking to switch my career to IT and specially in SAP (As it is in demand with secure future), so please suggest my the best SAP course to opt for and where in Delhi NCR considering the fact that I do not come from IT background plus if possible my experience can be counted in my future career in SAP. One institute which I have in my mind is Atos but if there is any other please let me know. Looking forward for your response. Regards, Nandini Sharma

answers.text: Dear Nandini, Regarding the institute please go through the following link http://scn.sap.com/community/career-center/blog/2015/08/13/best-institute-for-sap-training http://scn.sap.com/community/career-center/blog/2015/08/13/best-institute-for-sap-training Regards Shaik

data.title: Throw error message during order creation for recipe which are not released

qas.question: Hi Gurus, My client uses Process Orders,they have got production versions.In those production versions for some of the finished products they assigned recipes with status other than release.They are wanting that while creating the Process Order the system should not allow recipes which are not released. While creating Process order with the recipes which are not released the system is throwing an information message that the recipe is not released ,but while pressing enter it is allowing to proceed and then one can save the order. To prevent order creation with unreleased recipes 1.I changed the message type to error but still it is having no effect. 2.I assigned the automatic selection of recipe with status 4 only. 3. In OP46 where configuration of status is maintained I have checked the check box rel ind with staus 4 only. What else I need to do to restrict the recipes without release status to create the order. Regards Sandip Sarkar

answers.text: Dear, Please refer OSS note 416344 and 357368 for modification of warring message CO261. Regards, R.Brahmankar

data.title: From Which place I should try for Job?

qas.question: Dear Friends from India I have complete my course SAP-SD from Hyderabad but not getting any call from any company That so why i want to move either banglore or delhi. Would any one suggest me to that where I should go. Please help me to take decision which place will be good for getting frequently call and walk-In in sap sd. Arun

answers.text: Dear Arun, As per my knowledge the place do not matter much. You can upload your CV in jobsite ( naukri, monsterindia etc) and can get the calls. Most of the companies are willing to take the telephonic interview also (especially for the first technical round). The core of this market is knowledge. So practice as much as possible. Do let me know in case of any queries. Hope this helps you. Regards, Rakesh

data.title: Deliveries for which F8 has been done are appearing in VF04

qas.question: Dear all, Deliveries for which proforma invoice F8 has been done , are appearing in VF04. I know that +/- indicator is absent in VTFL. What other ways are there to adress the issue. Pl. help. regards.

answers.text: Hi, Whenever Proforma Invoices are created then the Order or delivery status remains open for invoicing. Example: Create a Proforma from delivery. Even then the delivey is open for invoicing. So Deliveries for which F8 has been done are appearing in VF04 is standard system behaviour. regards
